CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( ISBLANK(Estimated_of_Buyers__c), Estimated_of_Buyers__c = 0 ),"NONE", IF( Estimated_of_Buyers__c < 250,"Small", IF( AND( Estimated_of_Buyers__c >= 250, Estimated_of_Buyers__c < 1000),"Mid Market", IF( AND( Estimated_of_Buyers__c >= 1000, Estimated_of_Buyers__c < 5000 ),"Large","Enterprise" )))
)
CustomField.label: Segmentation
